source:
f = open('numbers.txt', "r")
refnum = f.read()

freqdict = {}
nums = range(11)
for i in nums:
    freqdict[i] = refnum.count(str(i))
print(freqdict)

import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

x = freqdict.keys()
y = freqdict.values()

plt.xlabel('Element')
plt.ylabel('Frequency')

plt.bar(x,y)
plt.show()

with open("frequency.json", "w") as out:
    json.dump(freqdict, out)

f = open("frequency.json", "r")
print(f.read())
f.close()

source:
import pandas as pd
df = pd.read_csv('amazon-orders1.csv')
print(df.to_string())

April_charges = df["Total Charged"].head(10)
April_sum = sum(April_charges)
April_avg = April_charges.mean()
April_orders = 10
May_charges = df["Total Charged"].loc[range(12,30)]
May_sum = sum(May_charges)
May_avg = May_charges.mean()
May_orders = 18
June_charges = df["Total Charged"].loc[range(30,36)]
June_sum = sum(June_charges)
June_avg = June_charges.mean()
June_orders = 6
July_charges = df["Total Charged"].tail(24)
July_sum = sum(July_charges)
July_avg = July_charges.mean()
July_orders = 24

monthly_avg = {'April': April_avg, 'May': May_avg, 'June': June_avg, 'July': July_avg}
print(monthly_avg)

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

y = monthly_sum.values()

plt.title('Total Monthly Payment')
plt.pie(y, labels = monthly_sum.keys())
plt.legend(bbox_to_anchor=(1.05,1.0), loc = 'upper left')

plt.show()

x = monthly_avg.keys()
y1 = monthly_avg.values()

plt.xlabel('Month')
plt.ylabel('Average Payment Amount')
plt.bar(x,y1)

plt.show()

y2 = monthly_orders.values()

plt.xlabel('Month')
plt.ylabel('Amount')
plt.title('Order and Average Payment Activity')
plt.plot(x, y1, x, y2, marker = 'o')
plt.legend(["Mean Payment", "Orders"], loc = 0)

plt.show()
